#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long n,req,flag,i,j;
    flag=0;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    vector<long long> v(n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&(v[i]));
    }
    scanf("%lld",&req);
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
    for(i=0,j=n-1;i<j;)
    {
        if(v[i]+v[j]==req)
        {
            flag=1;
            break;
        }
        else if(v[i]+v[j]>req)
        {
            j--;
        }
        else
        {
            i++;
        }
    }
    if(flag)
        printf("YES");
    else
        printf("NO");
    return 0;
}
